Description: A merchant bringing corn from Alexandria to Rhodes in time of famine; a boat laden with sacks of corn arriving in foreground; in background the inhabitants of a town standing at the dock; illustration to Cicero, 'Officia', Augsburg: Steiner, 1531. Woodcut
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (II.177.116)
